mapper.insert: insert into bus_service_item (name, original_price, discount_price, car_package, info, create_time, service_catalog, audit_status, sale_status, version) values (#{name}, #{originalPrice}, #{discountPrice}, #{carPackage}, #{info}, #{createTime}, #{serviceCatalog}, #{auditStatus}, #{saleStatus}, #{version})

mapper.select: select id, name, original_price, discount_price, car_package, info, create_time, service_catalog, audit_status, sale_status, version from bus_service_item where id = #{id}
